entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Dir
entry.label: Input directory
entry.help_brief: Path to input files. {cb+bb;GUI;/home/csdms/sims/roms/chesroms;}

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/File
entry.label: Input File name:
entry.help_brief: Name of input file.

entry.name: /ROMS/SitePrefix
entry.label: Site prefix:
entry.help_brief: Site prefix for input/output files.

entry.name: /ROMS/CasePrefix
entry.label: Case prefix:
entry.help_brief: Case prefix for input/output files.

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TITLE
entry.label: ROMS application title:
entry.help_brief: ROMS application title

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/MyAppCPP
entry.label: C-preprocessing flag:
entry.help_brief: C-preprocessing flag

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/VARNAME
entry.label: Variable information filename:
entry.help_brief: Variable information filename

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/RunInterval
entry.label: RunInterval:
entry.help_brief: Timestep multiplied by Timestep size [seconds]. In cases where input is read from a file rather than GUI

entry.name: HTML_HELP_FILE
entry.label: HTML help file:
entry.help_brief: URL for HTML help file

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Ngrids
entry.label: Number of nested grids:
entry.help_brief: Number of nested grids

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Lm
entry.label: Number of nodes in I-direction:
entry.help_brief: Number of I-direction interior rho-points

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Mm
entry.label: Number of nodes in J-direction:
entry.help_brief: Number of J-direction interior rho-points

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/N
entry.label: Number of vertical levels:
entry.help_brief: Number of vertical levels

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Nbed
entry.label: Number of sediment bed layers:
entry.help_brief: Number of sediment bed layers

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NAT
entry.label: Number of active tracers:
entry.help_brief: Number of active tracers (usually, 2; e.g. temp and salin)

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NPT
entry.label: Number of inactive passive tracers:
entry.help_brief: Number of inactive passive tracers

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NCS
entry.label: Number of cohesive (mud) sediment tracers:
entry.help_brief: Number of cohesive (mud) sediment tracers

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NNS
entry.label: Number of non-cohesive (sand) sediment tracers:
entry.help_brief: Number of non-cohesive (sand) sediment tracers

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NtileI
entry.label: Number of tiles in I-direction:
entry.help_brief: Number of tiles in I-direction (for parallel mode)

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NtileJ
entry.label: Number of tiles in J-direction:
entry.help_brief: Number of tiles in J-direction (for parallel mode)

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NTIMES
entry.label: Number of timesteps:
entry.help_brief: Number of timesteps

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/DT
entry.label: Timestep size:
entry.help_brief: Timestep size [seconds]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NDTFAST
entry.label: Number of barotropic steps:
entry.help_brief: Number of barotropic steps

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ERstr
entry.label: Starting perturbation or iteration:
entry.help_brief: Starting perturbation or iteration

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ERend
entry.label: Ending perturbation or iteration:
entry.help_brief: Ending perturbation or iteration

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Nouter
entry.label: Max number of 4DVar outer loop iterations:
entry.help_brief: Max number of 4DVar outer loop iterations

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Ninner
entry.label: Max number of 4DVar inner loop iterations:
entry.help_brief: Max number of 4DVar inner loop iterations

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Nintervals
entry.label: Number of stochastic optimals interval divisions:
entry.help_brief: Number of stochastic optimals interval divisions

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NEV
entry.label: Number of eigenvalues for GST analysis:
entry.help_brief: Number of eigenvalues for GST analysis

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NCV
entry.label: Number of eigenvectors for GST analysis:
entry.help_brief: Number of eigenvectors for GST analysis

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NRREC
entry.label: Model restart flag:
entry.help_brief: Model restart flag

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LcycleRST
entry.label: Switch to recycle restart records:
entry.help_brief: Switch to recycle restart time records [T or F]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NRST
entry.label: Number of time-steps between restart records:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between restart records

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NSTA
entry.label: Number of time-steps between stations records:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between stations records

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NFLT
entry.label: Number of time-steps between floats records:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between floats (drifters) records

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NINFO
entry.label: Number of time-steps between info diagnostics:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between information diagnostics

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LDEFOUT
entry.label: Switch to create (T) or append (F) files:
entry.help_brief: File creation/append switch [T or F]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NHIS
entry.label: Number of time-steps between history records:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between history records

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NDEFHIS
entry.label: Number of time-steps between creation of new history file:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between creation of new history file

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NTSAVG
entry.label: Starting averages timestep:
entry.help_brief: Starting averages timestep

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NAVG
entry.label: Number of time-steps between averages records:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between averages records

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NDEFAVG
entry.label: Number of time-steps between creation of new averages file:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between creation of new averages file

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NTSDIA
entry.label: Starting diagnostics timestep:
entry.help_brief: Starting diagnostics timestep

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NDIA
entry.label: Number of time-steps between diagnostics records:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between diagnostics records

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NDEFDIA
entry.label: Number of time-steps between creation of new diagnostics file:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between creation of new diagnostics file

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LcycleTLM
entry.label: Switch to recycle TLM time records:
entry.help_brief: Switch to recycle TLM time records [T or F]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NTLM
entry.label: Number of time-steps between TLM records:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between TLM records

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NDEFTLM
entry.label: Number of time-steps between creation of new TLM file:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between creation of new TLM file

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LcycleADJ
entry.label: Switch to recycle ADM time records:
entry.help_brief: Switch to recycle ADM time records [T or F]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NADJ
entry.label: Number of time-steps between ADM records:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between ADM records

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NDEFADJ
entry.label: Number of time-steps between creation of new ADM file:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between creation of new ADM file

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NSFF
entry.label: Number of time-steps between 4DVAR adjustment of SFF:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between 4DVAR adjustment of surface forcing fluxes

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NOBC
entry.label: Number of time-steps between 4DVAR adjustment of OBF:
entry.help_brief: Number of time-steps between 4DVAR adjustment of open boundary fields

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LrstGST
entry.label: Switch for GST restart:
entry.help_brief: Generalized Stability Theory restart switch [T or F]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/MaxIterGST
entry.label: Maximum number of iterations for GST:
entry.help_brief: Maximum number of iterations for Generalized Stability Theory

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NGST
entry.label: Checking point interval for GST:
entry.help_brief: Checking point interval for Generalized Stability Theory

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Ritz_tol
entry.label: Relative accuracy of Ritz values in GST:
entry.help_brief: Relative accuracy of Ritz values in Generalized Stability Analysis

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TNU2_I
entry.label: Harmonic horiz. diffusion coeff. for tracers (I-dir, NLM):
entry.help_brief: Harmonic horizontal diffusion coefficient for tracers in NONLINEAR model in the I-direction [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TNU2_J
entry.label: Harmonic horiz. diffusion coeff. for tracers (J-dir, NLM):
entry.help_brief: Harmonic horizontal diffusion coefficient for tracers in NONLINEAR model in the J-direction [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TNU4_I
entry.label: Biharmonic horiz. diffusion coeff. for tracers (I-dir, NLM):
entry.help_brief: Biharmonic horizontal diffusion coefficient for tracers in NONLINEAR model in the I-direction [m^4/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TNU4_J
entry.label: Biharmonic horiz. diffusion coeff. for tracers (J-dir, NLM):
entry.help_brief: Biharmonic horizontal diffusion coefficient for tracers in NONLINEAR model in the J-direction [m^4/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_TNU2_I
entry.label: Harmonic horiz. diffusion coeff. for tracers (I-dir, ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Harmonic horizontal diffusion coefficient for tracers in ADJOINT model in the I-direction [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_TNU2_J
entry.label: Harmonic horiz. diffusion coeff. for tracers (J-dir, ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Harmonic horizontal diffusion coefficient for tracers in ADJOINT model in the J-direction [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_TNU4_I
entry.label: Biharmonic horiz. diffusion coeff. for tracers (I-dir, ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Biharmonic horizontal diffusion coefficient for tracers in ADJOINT model in the I-direction [m^4/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_TNU4_J
entry.label: Biharmonic horiz. diffusion coeff. for tracers (J-dir, ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Biharmonic horizontal diffusion coefficient for tracers in ADJOINT model in the J-direction [m^4/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/VISC2
entry.label: Harmonic horiz. viscosity coeff. (NLM):
entry.help_brief: Harmonic horizontal viscosity coefficient in NONLINEAR model [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/VISC4
entry.label: Biharmonic horiz. viscosity coeff. (NLM):
entry.help_brief: Biharmonic horizontal viscosity coefficient in NONLINEAR model [m^4/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_VISC2
entry.label: Harmonic horiz. viscosity coeff. (ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Harmonic horizontal viscosity coefficient in ADJOINT model [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_VISC4
entry.label: Biharmonic horiz. viscosity coeff. (ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Biharmonic horizontal viscosity coefficient in ADJOINT model [m^4/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/AKT_BAK_active
entry.label: Background vert. mixing coeff. for active tracers (NLM):
entry.help_brief: Background vertical mixing coefficient for ACTIVE tracers in NONLINEAR model [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/AKT_BAK_passive
entry.label: Background vert. mixing coeff. for passive tracers (NLM):
entry.help_brief: Background vertical mixing coefficient for PASSIVE tracers in NONLINEAR model [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_AKT_fac_active
entry.label: Background vert. mixing coeff. for active tracers (ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Basic state scale factor for ACTIVE tracers in ADJOINT model [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_AKT_fac_passive
entry.label: Background vert. mixing coeff. for passive tracers (ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Basic state scale factor for PASSIVE tracers in ADJOINT model [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/AKV_BAK
entry.label: Background vert. mixing coeff. for momentum (NLM):
entry.help_brief: Background vertical mixing coefficient for momentum in NONLINEAR model [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ad_AKV_fac
entry.label: Background vert. mixing coeff. for momentum (ADJ):
entry.help_brief: Basic state scale factor for momentum in ADJOINT model [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/AKK_BAK
entry.label: Turbulent closure parameter 1:
entry.help_brief: Turbulent closure parameter 1 [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/AKP_BAK
entry.label: Turbulent closure parameter 2:
entry.help_brief: Turbulent closure parameter 2 [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TKENU2
entry.label: Turbulent closure parameter 3:
entry.help_brief: Turbulent closure parameter 3 [m^2/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TKENU4
entry.label: Turbulent closure parameter 4:
entry.help_brief: Turbulent closure parameter 4 [m^4/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_P
entry.label: K-epsilon parameter for GLS:
entry.help_brief: K-epsilon parameter (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_M
entry.label: Turbulent kinetic energy exponent for GLS:
entry.help_brief: Turbulent kinetic energy exponent (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_N
entry.label: Turbulent length scale exponent for GLS:
entry.help_brief: Turbulent length scale exponent (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_Kmin
entry.label: Min value of specific turbulent energy for GLS:
entry.help_brief: Min value of specific turbulent energy (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_Pmin
entry.label: Min value of dissipation for GLS:
entry.help_brief: Min value of dissipation (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_CMU0
entry.label: Stability coefficient (GLS, closure indep.):
entry.help_brief: Stability coefficient (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_C1
entry.label: Shear production coefficient (GLS, closure indep.):
entry.help_brief: Shear production coefficient (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_C2
entry.label: Dissipation coefficient (GLS, closure indep.):
entry.help_brief: Dissipation coefficient (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_C3M
entry.label: Buoyancy production coefficient, minus (GLS, closure indep):
entry.help_brief: Buoyancy production coefficient, minus (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_C3P
entry.label: Buoyancy production coefficient, plus (GLS, closure indep.):
entry.help_brief: Buoyancy production coefficient, plus (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_SIGK
entry.label: Constant Schmidt number for turb. KE diffusivity (GLS, closure indep.):
entry.help_brief: Constant Schmidt number for turbulent kinetic energy diffusivity (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GLS_SIGP
entry.label: Constant Schmidt number for turb. "psi" field (GLS, closure indep.):
entry.help_brief: Constant Schmidt number for turbulent generic statistical field, "psi" (Generic Length Scale closure) [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/CHARNOK_ALPHA
entry.label: Charnok surface roughness:
entry.help_brief: Charnok surface roughness[???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ZOS_HSIG_ALPHA
entry.label: Roughness from wave amplitude:
entry.help_brief: Roughness from wave amplitude [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/SZ_ALPHA
entry.label: Roughness from wave dissipation:
entry.help_brief: Roughness from wave dissipation [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/CRGBAN_CW
entry.label: Craig and Banner wave breaking coefficient:
entry.help_brief: Craig and Banner wave breaking coefficient [???]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/RDRG
entry.label: Momentum stress constant 1:
entry.help_brief: Constant used in momentum stress computation [m/s]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/RDRG2
entry.label: Momentum stress constant 2:
entry.help_brief: Constant used in momentum stress computation [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Zob
entry.label: Momentum stress constant 3:
entry.help_brief: Constant used in momentum stress computation [m]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Zos
entry.label: Momentum stress constant 4:
entry.help_brief: Constant used in momentum stress computation [m]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/BLK_ZQ
entry.label: Height of measurement for air humidity (bulk flux):
entry.help_brief: Height of atmospheric measurement for air humidity (bulk flux) [m]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/BLK_ZT
entry.label: Height of measurement for air temperature (bulk flux):
entry.help_brief: Height of atmospheric measurement for air temperature (bulk flux) [m]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/BLK_ZW
entry.label: Height of measurement for winds (bulk flux):
entry.help_brief: Height of atmospheric measurement for winds (bulk flux) [m]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/DCRIT
entry.label: Min depth for wetting and drying:
entry.help_brief: Min depth for wetting and drying [m]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/WTYPE
entry.label: Jerlov water type for shortwave radiation depth scale:
entry.help_brief: Jerlov water type used to set vertical depth scale for shortwave radiation absorption

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LEVSFRC
entry.label: Deepest level to apply surf. momentum stress as a body force:
entry.help_brief: Deepest level to apply surf. momentum stress as a body force [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LEVBFRC
entry.label: Shallowest level to apply surf. momentum stress as a body force:
entry.help_brief: Shallowest level to apply surf. momentum stress as a body force [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/RHO0
entry.label: Mean water density:
entry.help_brief: Mean water density [kg/m^3]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/BVF_BAK
entry.label: Brunt-Vaisala frequency:
entry.help_brief: Brunt-Vaisala frequency [1/s^2]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/DSTART
entry.label: Time-stamp for model initialization:
entry.help_brief: Time-stamp for model initialization [days]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TIDE_START
entry.label: Reference time origin for tidal forcing:
entry.help_brief: Reference time origin for tidal forcing [days]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TIME_REF
entry.label: Model reference time for output NetCDF units attribute:
entry.help_brief: Model reference time for output NetCDF units attribute [yyyymmdd.dd]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TNUDG1
entry.label: Nudging/relaxation time scale 1:
entry.help_brief: Nudging/relaxation time scale 1 [days]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TNUDG2
entry.label: Nudging/relaxation time scale 2:
entry.help_brief: Nudging/relaxation time scale 2 [days]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ZNUDG
entry.label: Nudging/relaxation time scale 3:
entry.help_brief: Nudging/relaxation time scale 3 [days]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/M2NUDG
entry.label: Nudging/relaxation time scale 4:
entry.help_brief: Nudging/relaxation time scale 4 [days]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/M3NUDG
entry.label: Nudging/relaxation time scale 5:
entry.help_brief: Nudging/relaxation time scale 5 [days]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/OBCFAC
entry.label: Factor between passive and active open BCs:
entry.help_brief: Factor between passive (outflow) and active (inflow) open boundary conditions [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/R0
entry.label: Linear equation of state density parameter:
entry.help_brief: Linear equation of state density parameter [kg/m^3]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/T0
entry.label: Linear equation of state temperature parameter:
entry.help_brief: Linear equation of state temperature parameter [Celsius]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/S0
entry.label: Linear equation of state salinity parameter:
entry.help_brief: Linear equation of state salinity parameter [PSU]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TCOEF
entry.label: Linear equation of state temperature coeff.:
entry.help_brief: Linear equation of state temperature coefficient [1/Celsius]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/SCOEF
entry.label: Linear equation of state salinity coeff.:
entry.help_brief: Linear equation of state salinity coefficient [1/PSU]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GAMMA2
entry.label: Slipperiness parameter: 1.0 (free slip) or -1.0 (no slip):
entry.help_brief: Slipperiness parameter: 1.0 (free slip) or -1.0 (no slip)

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LtracerSrc_temp
entry.label: Switch to use point sources/sinks for temperature:
entry.help_brief: Switch to use point sources/sinks for temperature [T or F]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LtracerSrc_salin
entry.label: Switch to use point sources/sinks for salinity:
entry.help_brief: Switch to use point sources/sinks for salinity [T or F]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/LtracerSrc_inert1
entry.label: Switch to use point sources/sinks for inert tracer 1:
entry.help_brief: Switch to use point sources/sinks for inert tracer 1 [T or F]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Vtransform
entry.label: Choice of vertical transformation equation:
entry.help_brief: Choice of vertical transformation equation for terrain-following coordinates [1 or 2]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/Vstretching
entry.label: Choice of vertical stretching function:
entry.help_brief: Choice of vertical stretching function for terrain-following coordinates [1, 2 or 3]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/THETA_S
entry.label: Surface control parameter for terrain-following coords:
entry.help_brief: Surface control/stretching parameter for terrain-following coords [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/THETA_B
entry.label: Bottom control parameter for terrain-following coords:
entry.help_brief: Bottom control/stretching parameter for terrain-following coords [unitless]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/TCLINE
entry.label: Width of surface or bottom layer which requires higher-res stretch:
entry.help_brief: Width of surface or bottom layer which requires higher-res stretch [meters]

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/GRDNAME
entry.label: Input grid file name:
entry.help_brief: Input grid file name

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/ININAME
entry.label: Nonlinear initial conditions file:
entry.help_brief: Input nonlinear initial conditions file name. It can be a re-start file.

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/BRYNAME
entry.label: Open boundary data file:
entry.help_brief: Input open boundary data file name.

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/NFFILES
entry.label: Number of forcing files:
entry.help_brief: Number of forcing files

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/FRCNAME
entry.label: Forcing fields file:
entry.help_brief: Input forcing fields file name. Each file should be separated by a back slash(\ or |)

entry.name: /ROMS/Input/Var/SPOSNAM
entry.label: Stations positions file:
entry.help_brief: Input stations positions file name.

entry.label: Model name:
entry.help_brief: Name of the model

entry.label: Author name:
entry.help_brief: Name of the model author

entry.label: HTML help file:
